definition[0]: someone who is brand-conscious only likes to buy products made by certain famous companies
example[0]: Chinese consumers are very brand-conscious when it comes to buying over-the-counter drugs.
definition[1]: a brand-conscious company or organization is very concerned about what people think of its name and its products
example[1]: For brand-conscious companies, the image that the company presents to clients is the most important part of their marketing strategy.
